alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 12:19AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 to 40 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1218 AM EDT, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Greenwich to near Hoosick Falls to near Selkirk to near Preston Hollow and moving east at 50 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Hoosick Falls and Cambridge around 1225 AM EDT. Shaftsbury and Averill Park around 1235 AM EDT. Bennington, Arlington, New Baltimore and Ravena around 1240 AM EDT. Berlin, Valatie and Kinderhook around 1245 AM EDT. Stephentown around 100 AM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 10. Interstate 87 between exits 21B and 22. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
